thread.title: Modern Hotel with Clean Functional Rooms and Bathrooms
thread.title_full: Modern Hotel with Clean Functional Rooms and Bathrooms - Review of Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: foodystar
title: Modern Hotel with Clean Functional Rooms and Bathrooms
text:
came in early and the front staff were very polite and promised to accommodate a check in as soon as something was available. The hotel did seem busy as I waited in the lobby for my room. Check in was 2pm and they got me a room by 11.45am. Brownie points.
The rooms I was give was kind of on the smaller side but clean, modern and functional. the Bathroom was clean and had good shower pressure. some more brownie points.
Basic breakfast spread available that did the job.
only issue I experienced was with the central air conditioning. Room was hot and no matter what I did the cooling would not turn on. Front desk was responsive and send maintenance to fix it but I think it was something that needed to be set on the master control. had to crack the window open which lead to some cooling but unwanted noises late night and early morning.
all the staff is very courteous and accommodating. makes up for the issues.
Room Tip: pre purchase breakfast for a lower price See more room tips
